content:
That's so beautiful! The fact that Alex had your grandmother's engagement ring redesigned for you is incredibly thoughtful and romantic. It's a wonderful way to honor your family's history and make the proposal even more meaningful.

Using a family heirloom like that also adds a sense of tradition and continuity to your engagement and wedding. I'm sure it must have been a really emotional moment for you when you realized what he had done.

Incorporating personal touches like that into your ceremony and wedding can make it feel even more special and unique to you as a couple. If you do decide to write your own vows, you could even mention the story behind the ring and how it symbolizes your connection to your family and each other.

What's your grandmother's reaction been to the proposal and the fact that Alex used her engagement ring? I'm sure she must be thrilled to see the ring being passed down and used in such a special way.
